name: TrafficSim_Demo
description:
My latest project: a traffic simulator. So far I have created a simple world generator with an in-game UI and then added the ability to add cars that drive around the gamespace.

Things I would like to add are:

- Improved driver AI (stopping at junctions, not driving through other cars etc.).

- An improved environment with 3D models etc.

-Trafficlights, pedestrians/pedestrian crossing

This is where I will be uploading newer versions of the project as I work on them. I am also keeping a blog over at myunityjourney.wordpress.com where I will show and explain the code used.
